subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ pitchers collectively went 0 for 64 at the plate to start the season, setting a modern record and stirring talk of extending the designated hitter rule to the National League.
snippet: The Mets’ pitchers collectively went 0 for 64 at the plate to start the season, setting a modern record and stirring talk of extending the designated hitter rule to the National League.
